_comments.CODING_AGENT_API_KEY: Generate from NotebookLLM app: Settings → Agent Connections → Generate New Token
_comments.WEBHOOK_URL: Optional: HTTPS URL to receive instant messages (e.g., https://your-server.com/webhook)
_comments.WEBHOOK_SECRET: Optional: Shared secret for webhook authentication (min 16 characters)

communication_options.polling: Use get_followup_messages to check for new messages (always available)
communication_options.webhook: Set WEBHOOK_URL and WEBHOOK_SECRET for push notifications
communication_options.websocket: Use get_websocket_info for real-time bidirectional communication
